a_software_update_is_available: A software update is available for this robot. Update to run protocols.
close_robot_door: Close the robot door before starting the run.
computer_in_app_is_controlling_robot: A computer with the Opentrons App is currently controlling this robot.
confirm_terminate: This will immediately stop the activity begun on a computer. You, or another user, may lose progress or see an error in the Opentrons App.
did_pipette_pick_up_tip: Did pipette pick up tip successfully?
drag_and_drop: Drag and drop or browse your files
general_error_message: If you keep getting this message, try restarting your app and/or robot. If this does not resolve the issue please contact Opentrons Support.
help_us_improve_send_error_report: Help us improve your experience by sending an error report to {{support_email}}
protocol_run_general_error_msg: Protocol run could not be created on the robot.
remember_my_selection_and_do_not_ask_aga: Remember my selection and don't ask again
robot_is_busy_no_protocol_run_allowed: This robot is busy and can’t run this protocol right now. <robotLink>Go to Robot</robotLink>
robot_is_reachable_but_not_responding: This robot's API server is not responding correctly to requests at IP address {{hostname}}
robot_was_seen_but_is_unreachable: This robot has been seen recently, but is currently not reachable at IP address {{hostname}}
stand_back_robot_is_in_motion: Stand back, robot is in motion
